# CloudGlance

> AI-powered document intelligence platform that transforms unstructured documents (PDFs, Excel, Word, drawings, scanned files) into structured data and automated workflows for enterprise tender bidding, vendor evaluation, and contract review.

## Quick Facts

- **Category**: Enterprise AI / Document Intelligence / Procurement Automation
- **Deployment**: Cloud-hosted SaaS (Azure)
- **Onboarding**: Same-day setup, no training required
- **Pricing**: Contact for enterprise pricing

## Core Capabilities

- **Document Processing**: Ingests PDFs, Word, Excel, images, drawings, scanned documents; extracts structured data from complex tables, BOQs, multi-format files
- **Information Extraction**: AI reads thousands of pages, extracts technical details, timelines, requirements with citations to source documents
- **Tender Bidding Automation**: Tender search, eligibility/go-no-go checks, form extraction and auto-fill, product/BOQ matching, risk/compliance verification
- **Tender Evaluation Automation**: Multi-vendor bid comparison, deviation and compliance scoring, customizable scorecards and audit-ready reports
- **Contract Review** (Coming): Clause extraction, risk identification, obligation mapping
- **Enterprise Integrations**: ERPs, SSO, drives (Azure, AWS S3, GCP), Gmail, Outlook, Slack, Microsoft Teams, WhatsApp

## Technical Specifications

- **Accuracy**: 99.7% extraction accuracy with source citations
- **Performance**: 80% reduction in document processing time; 72% faster bid cycle time
- **Capacity**: Enables 3x more opportunity pursuits without additional headcount
- **Security**: AES-256 encryption at rest, TLS 1.3 in transit, tenant isolation, RBAC, full audit logging
- **Compliance**: SOC 2 Type II aligned, ISO 27001 aligned, GDPR ready
- **Infrastructure**: Azure-hosted, Cloudflare WAF/DDoS protection, least-privilege IAM

## Primary Use Cases

### Tender Bidding
1. Eligibility & Go/No-Go Check — Matches tender requirements against org profile, certifications, project history
2. Information Extraction — Pulls technical details from 1000+ page documents with citations
3. Form Extraction & Filling — Converts tender forms to editable files, auto-populates from org data
4. Product & BOQ Matching — Maps requirements to company products/services, flags gaps
5. Risk & Compliance Checks — Pre-submission verification of mandatory requirements and attachments
6. Tender Search — Aggregates public tenders, auto-suggests relevant opportunities based on org profile

### Tender Evaluation
1. Bid Comparison — Normalizes vendor submissions for side-by-side technical/commercial/contractual comparison
2. Deviation & Compliance Scoring — Checks bids against RFP requirements, flags deviations and missing items
3. Scorecards & Reports — Applies configurable scoring metrics, generates audit-ready evaluation reports

## Target Industries

- Construction & Infrastructure
- Manufacturing
- Technology & IT Services
- Energy
- Real Estate & Property Development
- Government & Public Sector

## Target Teams

- Operations & Project Management
- Business Development & Sales
- Procurement
- Compliance, Legal & Risk
- Management & Decision-Makers

## Problem/Solution

**Problem**: Enterprise teams waste 60-80% of time on manual document review, form filling, and compliance checking for tenders and contracts. Information trapped in unstructured documents leads to missed deadlines, errors, and lost opportunities.

**Solution**: CloudGlance AI reads and structures document content automatically, enabling teams to complete in minutes what previously took days. Every extraction includes source citations for verification.

## Differentiators vs Generic AI (ChatGPT, etc.)

- Handles 1000+ page documents reliably (no context window limits)
- Every extraction includes source citation for verification
- No hallucination — structured extraction, not generative responses
- End-to-end workflow automation, not just Q&A
- Enterprise-grade security and compliance
- Collaboration features for team review and approval

## Customer Proof Points

- Clients: ABB, Welspun, Cortex Consulting, SSA Techno Construction
- "Cut tender analysis from weeks to days" — Cortex Consulting
- "Bid capacity tripled" — enterprise customers
- "Handles large document volumes without compromising accuracy" — Welspun

## Site Structure

- `/` — Homepage with platform overview
- `/product` — Platform features, security, integrations
- `/automations/tender-bidding` — Tender bidding workflow details
- `/automations/tender-evaluation` — Bid evaluation workflow details
- `/solutions` — Team and industry-specific use cases
- `/company` — About, mission, team
- `/faq` — Common questions
- `/contact` — Demo booking
